feedback: You're not alone in feeling nervous. Take a breath this is just a conversation, not a test of your worth. You've prepared. You’ve got this.
Take a moment, no rush at all. We are just having a friendly chat there s no pressure here.
It is okay to pause and think. We are here to learn about you, not to test you.
Breathe in slowly and out. You are doing just fine. Let us continue when you are ready.
You do not need to be perfect just be clear and calm
You are more capable than you feel just keep going one step at a time
your voice matters speak with confidence even if your heart is racing
Trust yourself you know more than you think and you belong here
Stay present stay grounded and let each word come naturally
Let go of fear and let your effort speak for you gently and clearly
